name: Unity Flying Controller [Available on the asset store]
name_original: Unity Flying Controller [Available on the asset store]
description:
Third person flying controller is a professionally made controller system, for platformer movement and flying movement, available to purchase from the unity asset store

Use this controller to allow your character to fly around areas freely

[Purchase on the unity asset store]

Controls

Use WASD to move on the ground

Space to jump

Hold Space in mid air to fly

Use W and S to fly up and down

Use A and D to fly left and right

Use Q and E to roll left and right

Try to fly through rings to gain a short boost of speed!

Controller Features
• Third Person Platformer System
• Third Person Flying System
• Third Person Camera Controller
• Flying Gravity System
• Flying Momentum Control System
• Fully Animated Playable Character
